poll_list.title: Maker Teleport Deployment on Starknet and Associated Risk Parameters - August 15, 2022

discourse_list.title: Request for Poll: Starknet bridge deposit limit and Starknet teleport fees

content.content: Request to Poll for Maker teleport Deployment on Starknet and Associated Risk Parameters Starknet Engineering Core Unit is requesting to poll on the following parameters as part of the weekly governance cycle, which if successful will allow this to proceed to an on-chain vote.  Parameter Summary SNE-001 (Starknet Engineering Core Unit) is requesting Governance to poll on: Wormhole Fee Parameters per Domain for Fast Withdrawals:  Set the Starknet teleport Fee parameter to 1 bps  Deposit limit  Set the deposit limit to 1000 DAI   Details:   From experience on other L2s, we learned that setting up AMM pools early are crucial for the trajectory of DAI on a rollup   Myswap is the very first AMM (unsiwap v2) on mainnet. They have launched a first pool ETH/USDC and are looking to launch a second on ETH/DAI   In order to facilitate the initial liquidity on the pool, we are increasing the bridge deposit limit from 50 to 1000 DAI   The teleport Fee is set to 1 bps to align with Optimism and Arbitrum
content.GPT-summary: The Starknet Engineering Core Unit is requesting a poll on the deposit limit and teleport fees for Maker teleport deployment on Starknet. They are proposing to set the teleport fee parameter to 1 bps and the deposit limit to 1000 DAI to facilitate initial liquidity on the pool. They are also seeking feedback and constructive criticism on their proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
